thread.title: Save £10 on beauty and fragrance products
thread.title_full: Save £10 on beauty and fragrance products - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save £10 on beauty and fragrance products
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with feelunique.com to offer readers exclusive savings on top brands including Jean Paul Gaultier, Hugo Boss and Paco Rabane. Choose from more than 20,000 beauty and fragrance products for both men and women, and enjoy free worldwide delivery on orders over £10 plus free UK returns. Feelunique.com is Europe’s largest premium online beauty and fragrance retailer, with more than 500 top beauty brands including Clarisonic, Benefit and Elemis. From luxury haircare and skincare brands including Philip Kingsley and Decleor, to high-end fragrances such as Gucci and Calvin Klein, all your beauty essentials are only a click away. How to claim To save £10 when you spend £25 or more, see the newspaper on Saturday, October 24, 2015. telegraph.co.uk
